trustfund:
TF028516-EAS - RUSSIA,TF026083-USTDA CTF/RUSSIA OILFIELD EQUIPMENT,TF026081-USTDA CTF,TF023875-USAID-ENERGY/ENVIRONMENT STUDY
            IN NIS,TF023450-CANADIAN CONSULTANT TF FOR ENVIRONMENT,TF022620-CANADIAN CTF FOR E. & C.
            EUROPE & THE CIS,TF037625-RUSSIA - OIL REHABILITATION,TF034419-ECA REGION - PETROLUM AND
            PROJECT WORK,TF033488-RUSSIA - OIL REHABILATION PROJECT,TF033097-RUSSIA - ENERGY,TF031912-UZBEKISTAN - ENERGY,TF031907-RUSSIA - OIL,TF031176-RUSSIA - OIL,TF022685-PHRD-FIRST ENVIRON. INVESTMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The project will fund specific
            investments in oil production operations with the objectives
            of:  retarding the rate of decline of oil production and
            exports in the near term; strengthening the managerial and
            technical capabilities as well as the financial viability of
            selected oil producing enterprises; and mobilizing
            additional financial resources for the sector through
            commitments to cofinancing and through the demonstration
            effect of the project.  The following components are
            included in the project:  (a) workover, completion and
            rehabilitation of 1,300 production oil wells including
            provision of specialized oilfield technical services; (b)
            in-fill drilling of 84 new wells in existing fields; (c)
            replacement of over 1,000 km of oil gathering lines and
            production flow lines which will reduce oil leakages and
            thus address an important environmental concern as well as
            recover oil currently wasted; (d) provision of a topping
            plant to produce refined products for oil field operations
            and natural gas liquids extraction units to recover
            hydrocarbon liquids and reduce flaring, thereby reducing CO2
            and particulate emissions; and (e) technical assistance,
            data processing facilities and training.
